tags.name: Contact Global Restrictions
tags.description: Global restrictions for a contact, a.k.a. estate-wide restrictions or contact restrictions

get.summary: Returns the data for a prisoner contact by prisonerContactId
get.description:
Requires role: ROLE_CONTACTS_MIGRATION.
      Used to get the details for one prisoner contact.

parameters.name: prisonerContactId
parameters.description: The internal ID for a prisoner contact.

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

404.description: No prisoner contact reference with that id could be found

Requires role: ROLE_CONTACTS_MIGRATION.

400.description: Invalid input data

404.description: Prisoner contact not found

post.summary: Add a new prisoner contact relationship
post.description: Creates a new relationship between the contact and a prisoner.

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

400.description: The request has invalid or missing fields

404.description: Could not find the prisoner or contact that this relationship relates to

get.description:
Get the restrictions that apply for this relationship.
      
      This includes prisoner-contact restrictions for this specific relationship only and any global (estate-wide) restrictions for the contact.
      
      If the prisoner and contact have multiple relationships, the prisoner-contact restrictions for the other relationships will not be returned.

parameters.name: prisonerContactId
parameters.description: The id of the prisoner contact

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

404.description: The Prisoner contact relationship was not found.

post.description: Creates a new prisoner contact restriction for the specified prisoner contact relationship

parameters.name: prisonerContactId
parameters.description: The id of the prisoner contact relationship

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

400.description: The request has invalid or missing fields

201.description: Created the prisoner contact restriction successfully

404.description: Could not find the the prisoner contact relationship this prisoner contact restriction is for

post.description: Migrate a contact from NOMIS with all of its associated data.

200.description: The contact and associated data was created successfully

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

400.description: The request failed validation with invalid or missing data supplied

409.description: Conflict. The request contained a personId which already exists

post.description: Creates a new contact that is not yet associated with any prisoner.

Location.description: The URL where you can load the contact

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

404.description: Could not find the prisoner that this contact has a relationship to

400.description: The request has invalid or missing fields

get.description:
Get a contacts global restrictions only. Global restrictions apply to all of a contacts relationships and are known as estate-wide restrictions in NOMIS.

      Additional restrictions between the contact and specific prisoners may also apply.

parameters.name: contactId
parameters.description: The id of the contact

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

200.description: Found the contact and their restrictions

404.description: No contact with that id could be found

post.description: Creates a new global (estate-wide) restriction for the specified contact

parameters.name: contactId
parameters.description: The id of the contact

404.description: Could not find the the contact this global restriction is for

400.description: The request has invalid or missing fields

get.summary: Endpoint to return reference data for a provided group key. Sorted by display order then description by default.

parameters.name: groupCode
parameters.description: The group code of the reference codes to load

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort configuration - default displayOrder, description

parameters.name: activeOnly
parameters.description: Whether to only return active codes or not, defaults to true

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

parameters.description: The prison number of the prisoner who's contacts will be returned

get.summary: Endpoint to fetch all contacts for a specific prisoner by prisoner number and active status

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Whether to include only active (true) or inactive (false) contacts

parameters.name: pageable
parameters.description: Pageable configurations

200.description: List of all contacts for the prisoner

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

404.description: The Prisoner was not found.

contactId.description: The ID of the prisoner contact

contactType.description:
Coded value indicating either a social or official contact (mandatory).
      This is a coded value from the group code CONTACT_TYPE in reference data.
      Known values are (S) Social/Family or (O) official.

nextOfKin.description: Indicates if the prisoner contact is next of kin

emergencyContact.description: Indicates if the prisoner contact is an emergency contact

comments.description: Additional comments about the prisoner contact

active.description: Indicates if the prisoner contact is active

approvedVisitor.description: Indicates if the prisoner contact is an approved visitor

currentTerm.description: Indicates if this relationship applies to the latest booking

approvedBy.description: The user who approved the prisoner contact

approvedTime.description: The timestamp when the prisoner contact was approved

expiryDate.description: The expiry date of the prisoner contact

createdAtPrison.description: The prison where the prisoner contact was created

updatedBy.description: The user who last updated the prisoner contact

updatedTime.description: The timestamp of when the prisoner contact was changed

SyncUpdatePrisonerContactRequest.description: Request object to update prisoner contact details

contactId.description: The ID of the prisoner contact

contactType.description:
Coded value indicating either a social or official contact (mandatory).
      This is a coded value (from the group code CONTACT_TYPE in reference data).
      Known values are (S) Social/Family or (O) official.

relationshipType.description: The relationship code from reference data

nextOfKin.description: Indicates if the prisoner contact is next of kin

emergencyContact.description: Indicates if the prisoner contact is an emergency contact

comments.description: Additional comments about the prisoner contact

active.description: Indicates if the prisoner contact is active

approvedVisitor.description: Indicates if the prisoner contact is an approved visitor

currentTerm.description: Indicates if this relationship applies to the latest booking

approvedBy.description: The user who approved the prisoner contact

approvedTime.description: The timestamp when the prisoner contact was approved

expiryDate.description: The expiry date of the prisoner contact

createdAtPrison.description: The prison where the prisoner contact was created

createdBy.description: The user who created the prisoner contact

createdTime.description: The timestamp when the prisoner contact was created

updatedBy.description: The user who last updated the prisoner contact

updatedTime.description: The timestamp when the prisoner contact was last updated

SyncPrisonerContact.description: Response object with prisoner contact details

expiryDate.description: Expiry date of the restriction, if applicable

comments.example: Restriction applied due to safety concerns

updatedBy.description: User who last updated the restriction record

updatedTime.description: Time when the restriction record was last updated

SyncUpdatePrisonerContactRestrictionRequ.description: Request object to update te  prisoner contact restriction details

prisonerContactRestrictionId.description: ID of the prisoner contact restriction

prisonerContactId.description: ID of the prisoner contact (relationship) to which the restriction applies

contactId.description: ID of the contact (person) to which the restriction applies

prisonerNumber.description: The prisoner number involved in this relationship restriction

restrictionType.description:
The coded type of restriction that applies to this relationship.
    This is a coded value from the group RESTRICTION in reference codes.
    Example values include ACC, BAN, CHILD, CLOSED, RESTRICTED, DIHCON, NONCON.

expiryDate.description: Expiry date of the restriction, if applicable

comments.example: Restriction applied due to safety concerns

createdBy.description: User who created the restriction record

createdTime.description: Time when the restriction record was created

updatedBy.description: User who last updated the restriction record

updatedTime.description: Time when the restriction record was last updated

SyncPrisonerContactRestriction.description: Response object with prisoner contact restriction details

title.description:
The title code for the contact.
    This is a coded value (from the group code TITLE in reference data).
    Known values are MR, MRS, MISS, DR, MS, REV, SIR, BR, SR.

lastName.description: The last name of the contact

firstName.description: The first name of the contact

middleName.description: The middle name of the contact, if any

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the contact, if known

estimatedIsOverEighteen.description: Whether the contact is over 18, based on their date of birth if it is known

isStaff.description: Whether the contact is a staff member

remitter.description: Whether the contact is a remitter

deceasedDate.description: The date the contact was deceased, if applicable

gender.description:
The gender code for the contact.
    This is a coded value (from the group code GENDER in reference data).
    Known values are (M) Male, (F) Female, (NK) Not Known, (NS) Not Specified.

domesticStatus.description: The domestic status code of the contact

languageCode.description: The language code of the contact

updatedBy.description: The id of the user who updated the contact

updatedTime.description: The timestamp of when the contact was changed

SyncUpdateContactRequest.description: Request to update a new contact

title.description:
The title code for the contact.
    This is a coded value (from the group code TITLE in reference data).
    Known values are MR, MRS, MISS, DR, MS, REV, SIR, BR, SR.

lastName.description: The last name of the contact

firstName.description: The first name of the contact

middleName.description: The middle name of the contact, if any

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the contact, if known

estimatedIsOverEighteen.description: Whether the contact is over 18, based on their date of birth if it is known

isStaff.description: Whether the contact is a staff member

remitter.description: Whether the contact is a remitter

deceasedDate.description: The date the contact was deceased, if applicable

gender.description:
The gender code for the contact.
